text.value: Client to go to the health facility on:
Patient still has medication in hand
Patient visited but master card is missing
Reached out to POSER but has received no feedback
_Be sure you submit to complete this action._
Date cannot be in the past!
Date cannot be in the future!
None cannot be selected with any other option!
Please fill a death report after submission of this form.
Date cannot be in the past!
Reached out to POSER but has received no feedback
None cannot be selected with any other option!
Died cannot be selected with any other option!
Reached out to POSER but has received no feedback
Patient still has medication in hand
Patient visited but master card is missing
Linkage to care referral: Must attend IC3 for screening
Tsiku lomwe munthuyo akufunika kupita kuchipatala:
Wodwala yemwe adayendera koma khadi yayikulu ikusowa
Simungasankhe palibe ngati mwasankha kale china!
Chonde lembani lipoti lakufa mukatumiza fomu iyi.
Simungasankhe palibe ngati mwasankha kale china!
Simungasankhe akufa ngati mwasankha kale china!
Wodwala yemwe adayendera koma khadi yayikulu ikusowa
Sanafike kuchipatala kukalandira mankhwala a chifuwa chachikulu
Sanafike kuchipatala kukalandira mankhwala a kunyetchera
Kulumikizitsa anthu omwe apezeka ndi vuto ku chipatala: Akuyenera kupita ku IC3 kuti akafufuzidwebe

bind.calculate: if(../trace_details/trace_outcomes != '' and not(selected(../trace_details/trace_outcomes, 'not_found') or selected(../trace_details/trace_outcomes, 'moved') or selected(../trace_details/trace_outcomes, 'receiving_care_outside_neno') or selected(../trace_details/trace_outcomes, 'died')), 'yes', 'no')

bind.relevant: regex( /trace_follow_up/c_trace_reasons , 'TB') or regex( /trace_follow_up/c_trace_reasons , 'Malnutrition') or regex( /trace_follow_up/c_trace_reasons , 'Lab') or regex( /trace_follow_up/c_trace_reasons , 'Due') or regex( /trace_follow_up/c_trace_reasons , 'Linkage') or regex( /trace_follow_up/c_trace_reasons , 'Other')
../trace_outcomes != '' and not(selected(../trace_outcomes, 'moved') or selected(../trace_outcomes, 'traveled') or selected(../trace_outcomes, 'died'))
../trace_outcomes != '' and not(selected(../trace_outcomes, 'moved') or selected(../trace_outcomes, 'traveled') or selected(../trace_outcomes, 'died'))
../trace_outcomes != '' and not(selected(../trace_outcomes, 'moved') or selected(../trace_outcomes, 'traveled') or selected(../trace_outcomes, 'died'))
../trace_outcomes != '' and not(selected(../trace_outcomes, 'moved') or selected(../trace_outcomes, 'traveled') or selected(../trace_outcomes, 'died'))
../trace_outcomes != '' and not(selected(../trace_outcomes, 'moved') or selected(../trace_outcomes, 'traveled') or selected(../trace_outcomes, 'died'))
../trace_outcomes != '' and not(selected(../trace_outcomes, 'moved') or selected(../trace_outcomes, 'traveled') or selected(../trace_outcomes, 'died'))
../trace_outcomes != '' and not(selected(../trace_outcomes, 'moved') or selected(../trace_outcomes, 'traveled') or selected(../trace_outcomes, 'died'))
